StringProperty.Name: MODEL_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the model published in the database and the name of the executable. The default is the name of the grandparent folder of the project file.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_NAMES
StringProperty.Description: The scenario name or list of names to publish in the database. The default is Default. It can be a list of names separated by semicolons

StringProperty.Name: FIXED_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of a folder in parameters which contains values of fixed (invariant) parameters. Default is none.

EnumProperty.Name: GRID_COMPUTING
EnumProperty.Description: Incorporate or not MPI capability into the model executable.

EnumValue.Name: MPI
EnumValue.Description: Select MPI to incorporate multi-processing capability. A trailing _mpi will be added to the executable name.

BoolProperty.Name: MODEL_DOC
BoolProperty.Description: Produce human readable reference documentation for the model (end user version).

BoolProperty.Name: MODEL_DEVDOC
BoolProperty.Description: Produce human readable reference documentation for the model (model developer version). The model dev version contains additional information not visible to end users.

BoolProperty.Name: NO_METADATA
BoolProperty.Description: Can be useful in large models to quickly identify model coding errors, but breaks model build.

BoolProperty.Name: NO_CPP_BUILD
BoolProperty.Description: Can be useful in large models to quickly identify model coding errors, but breaks model build.

BoolProperty.Name: NO_LINE_DIRECTIVES
BoolProperty.Description: Use this option if the correspondence between model source code and execution in the Visual Studio debugger seems erroneous. Please contact the OpenM++ team if this occurs.

BoolProperty.Name: DISABLE_ITERATOR_DEBUG
BoolProperty.Description: For a normal Debug build, leave empty or set to No. Set to Yes if needed to improve run speed in Debug mode, especially for time-based models which can appear to hang at simulation end in Debug mode or when iterating large collections. This property has no effect for a Release build.

BoolProperty.Name: RUN_SCENARIO
BoolProperty.Description: Run the scenario after building and publishing the model and scenario(s).

StringProperty.Name: MODEL_INI
StringProperty.Description: The name of an ini file located in the model root folder containing model run options. The default is MODEL_NAME.ini, if present.

IntProperty.Name: PROCESSES
IntProperty.DisplayName: Number of processes to launch (requires MPI)
IntProperty.Description: This property has no effect unless the model was build with MPI capability incorporated.

BoolProperty.Name: DBCOPY_EXPORT_CSV
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Export model run results into csv files
BoolProperty.Description: Export model run parameters and output tables into csv files

BoolProperty.Name: OPEN_MODEL_WEB_UI
BoolProperty.Description: Publish model in web-service and open model web UI using default browser
